value.title: Dataflows and power query - November 2020 update
value.excerpt: Have you seen the new and upcoming features released on November 2020 for Dataflows and Power Query? In today's video, I will go through them so you stay up to date:  00:00 Intro 00:24 New Diagram view 01:36 New schema view 02:16 Add column from example  02:20 Add web from example 03:13 Fuzzy grouping

value.title: Dynamically add missing columns in Power Query

value.title: Fix the "Enter data" limitation in Power Query
value.excerpt: If you are trying to import data in Power BI using Power Query "Enter Data", you might see this message: "The clipboard contents are too large to be pasted into the table. Please split your data into multiple tables with less than 3,000 cells".  In this video I will show you one way to get around it.

value.title: How to create functions in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how to create a custom function in Power Query.  Custom functions are re-usable pieces of code. value.title: Scrape data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks

value.title: Generate Year Month Day Combinations in Power BI Report using Power Query Date ToText Function
value.excerpt: A common requirement when reporting data with a Date axis is to be able to see the year and the month in a short form beside each other. value.title: Split Column by Delimiter in Power BI and Power Query
value.excerpt: If you have a delimiter character (or part of the text) that is repeated multiple times, and you want to extract all the text parts based on that, there is a simple way for it. In this article, I'll explain how to extract multiple parts of a text value based on a delimiter in Power BI using Power Query.
